properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 7:25PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...

Green River at Calhoun and Paradise

.Runoff from recent heavy rainfall will cause the Green River at Paradise
and at Calhoun to rise into moderate flood stage. At Paradise, the river
is forecast to crest at 387.8 feet on Friday morning. At Calhoun, the
river is forecast to crest at 28.3 on Monday morning.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Calhoun.
* from this evening until further notice.
* At  7:00 PM Wednesday the stage was 23.1 feet.
* Flood Stage is 23.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Moderate flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue rising to near 28.3 feet by
Monday morning.  Additional rises may be possible thereafter.
* Impact...At 30.0 Feet...Lower Calhoun begins flooding.  A large
portion of Rumsey is flooded and evacuation of homes becomes
necessary.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
